properties.name: _Illinois Territory
properties.note:
Illinois Territory (1816-12-11)

1816/12/11 -> 1818/12/02

The state of Indiana created from Illinois, Indiana, and Michigan Territories; EDWARDS exchanged small areas along the Wabash River with the state of Indiana, establishing the boundary between the present states of Illinois and Indiana.

(U.S. Stat., vol. 3, ch. 57 [1816], secs. 1-2/pp. 289-291, and res. 1 [1816]/pp. 399-400; Van Zandt, 115)
